statements: DELETE FROM student_enrollment WHERE program_name = 'Computer Science' AND age < 20;
DELETE FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id = 100 AND enrollment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM student_enrollment WHERE program_name = 'Computer Science' AND age >= 20;
DELETE FROM programs WHERE program_type = 'Full-time' AND program_name = 'Engineering';
DELETE FROM Students WHERE age > 25 AND enrolled_program = 'Computer Science';
DELETE FROM Enrollments WHERE student_id = 2 AND course_id = 3;
